content.html: August 1990 "Hello Martin. It's Tom. Strange how I always I get you." "Just coincidence. The Birmingham train again?" "Uhm, yes please. You probably think I'm some sort of lovesick fool." "I remember that feeling. The breathless thrill of possibility. 3:30 Tom." "Cheers." 4/12
content.value:
August 1990
"Hello Martin. It's Tom. Strange how I always I get you."
"Just coincidence. The Birmingham train again?"
"Uhm, yes please. You probably think I'm some sort of lovesick fool."
"I remember that feeling. The breathless thrill of possibility. 3:30 Tom."
"Cheers."
4/12
